flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Based on similar LED projects (throwies, blinky bugs, etc) this puts the basic circuit into a wine cork 'head'. Pipe cleaner antlers, LED nose, googly eyes (or more LEDS), and scrap electronic components to add ears, teeth, and whatever else you feel your reindeer need for adornment. Can be mounted to hang from tree (switch on bottom) or mounted on bamboo skewer with switch on top.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Based on similar LED projects (throwies, blinky bugs, etc) this puts the basic circuit into a wine cork 'head'. Pipe cleaner antlers, LED nose, googly eyes (or more LEDS), and scrap electronic components to add ears, teeth, and whatever else you feel your reindeer need for adornment. Can be mounted to hang from tree (switch on bottom) or mounted on bamboo skewer with switch on top.

Relevant parts
  • wine cork
  • LED, Red
  • CR2032 Lithium Battery
  • Paper clips
Tools
  • Dremel tool with cuttigng, grinding, or routing bits
  • Soldering/desoldering tools
  • Wire cutter/stripper
guide.summary: In this guide a champagne cork is transformed into a whimsical LEDhead with a simple circuit that blinks Rudy's nose. The circuit is basic button battery to LED setup using springs or wires to create a sensitive contact switch. Wind or vibration causes sw
guide.title: LEDheads: Rudy, The LED Nose Reindeer

tools.text: Dremel tool with cuttigng, grinding, or routing bits
